page.title: 18LIVING IN HIGH LAVER
page.content: I live in High Laver near Moreton. I enjoy living in the country because it is in the country where it is nice and peaceful. I dont think I would enjoy living in the town because it would be too noisy in the morning and at night because of all the cars. I like the country because there are so many things to look at like flowers and birds and all sorts of things. Also the air is fresh and more healthy than city or town air which has horrible fumes in it. The thing I like the most about the country is that my Dad works on a farm so I can go and help him, especially at harvest time.
